main event: Two witnesses observed two lights in the sky for approximately 10 minutes on November 6, 1967, in Mason, Texas.
interesting points: The witnesses speculated that the lights could have been satellites or stars., The sighting lasted for a total of 4 hours and 5 minutes., The objects were described as moving from west to east and then exhibiting erratic motion., One object was noted to have a brighter blue-white color and did not seem to disappear., The observation was conducted in clear weather conditions during the evening.
witness description: Individuals who reported an unidentified aerial phenomenon, one of which is a physician.
